DOC.brief_summary: Background : Ingrown toenail one frequent nail disorder treat conservative surgical approach . Although discover long time ago , available data still limit potential effectiveness nail brace ingrown toenail treatment . Objective : This study aim evaluate efficacy nail brace ( combiped podofix ) treatment ingrown toenail .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Efficacy Nail Brace Treatment Ingrown Toenails

Depends disease condition , investigator apply 1-2 combiped nail brace . If pyogenic granuloma resolve 1 week , investigator apply podofix first 2-4 week combiped nail brace . After nail brace apply , participant must come back 2-4 week depend disease condition.10 patient ( 3 ) podofix group : participant afraid combiped implantation , mild recurrence apply podofix . Participants come back every month evaluation photography .
